subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Reggie Jackson, making his first start of the season at point guard, scored 13 of his 17 points in the second half Saturday to lift the Eagles to a 71-67 win over the struggling Tar Heels.
snippet: Reggie Jackson, making his first start of the season at point guard, scored 13 of his 17 points in the second half Saturday to lift the Eagles to a 71-67 win over the struggling Tar Heels.
